name: Advanced Cell Supervision
summary: With the Advanced Cell Supervision feature, the operator can get information

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.advCellSupSensitivity  EUtranCellTDD.advCellSupSensitivity
parameters.description: The value depends on the traffic load in the supervised cell. Engineering Guidelines for Advanced Cell Supervision provides guidelines on how to set this parameter.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.advCellSupAction  EUtranCellTDD.advCellSupAction
parameters.description: See AdvCellSupActions for the values of the                 enum.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_ADV_CELL_SUP_DETECTION
parameters.description: The event is generated when Advanced Cell Supervision suspects a sleeping cell.                   The parameter shows which detectors have been triggered.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_ADV_CELL_SUP_RECOVERY_ATTEMPT
parameters.description: The event is generated when Advanced Cell Supervision attempts to recover from a                   suspected sleeping cell using the cell lock and unlock recovery action.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_ADV_CELL_SUP_RECOVERY_RESULT
parameters.description: The event is generated after Advanced Cell Supervision has attempted to recover                   from a suspected sleeping cell using a cell lock and unlock recovery action. The                   parameter shows whether or not the recovery was regarded successful.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_CELL_AI_ACS_REPORT
parameters.description: If cell trace is activated (including profile), RRC/S1 bigram data set and RACH                   data for AI Powered ACS are reported by cell trace.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_CELL_AI_ACS_REPORT
parameters.description: If cell trace is activated (including profile), RRC/S1 bigram data set and RACH                   data for AI Powered ACS are reported by cell trace.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_CELL_AI_ACS_REPORT
parameters.description: If cell trace is activated (including profile), RRC/S1 bigram data set and RACH                   data for AI Powered ACS are reported by cell trace.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_CELL_AI_ACS_REPORT
parameters.description: If cell trace is activated (including profile), RRC/S1 bigram data set and RACH                   data for AI Powered ACS are reported by cell trace.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_AI_ACS_CONCEPT_DRIFT_DETECTION
parameters.description: Indicates whether AI Powered ACS detects concept drift.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_ADV_CELL_SUP_DETECTION
events.description: The event is generated when Advanced Cell Supervision suspects a sleeping cell.                   The parameter shows which detectors have been triggered.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_ADV_CELL_SUP_RECOVERY_ATTEMPT
events.description: The event is generated when Advanced Cell Supervision attempts to recover from a                   suspected sleeping cell using the cell lock and unlock recovery action.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_ADV_CELL_SUP_RECOVERY_RESULT
events.description: The event is generated after Advanced Cell Supervision has attempted to recover                   from a suspected sleeping cell using a cell lock and unlock recovery action. The                   parameter shows whether or not the recovery was regarded successful.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_CELL_AI_ACS_REPORT
events.description: If cell trace is activated (including profile), RRC/S1 bigram data set and RACH                   data for AI Powered ACS are reported by cell trace.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_CELL_AI_ACS_REPORT
events.description: If cell trace is activated (including profile), RRC/S1 bigram data set and RACH                   data for AI Powered ACS are reported by cell trace.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_CELL_AI_ACS_REPORT
events.description: If cell trace is activated (including profile), RRC/S1 bigram data set and RACH                   data for AI Powered ACS are reported by cell trace.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_CELL_AI_ACS_REPORT
events.description: If cell trace is activated (including profile), RRC/S1 bigram data set and RACH                   data for AI Powered ACS are reported by cell trace.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_AI_ACS_CONCEPT_DRIFT_DETECTION
events.description: Indicates whether AI Powered ACS detects concept drift.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4010320 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4010320 MO instance.
